original_text: That was the land that Joshua gave to the families of Zebulun's tribe, as well as the towns and their villages.
korean_text: 스불론 자손이 그들의 가족대로 받은 기업은 이 성읍들과 그 마을들이었더라

sentences.original_text: that Joshua gave to the families of Zebulun's tribe
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아가 스불론 지파의 가족들에게 준 땅
